segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much of a mess this is becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’d be screaming if I were her, but she’s just calm as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined, and the floor is a swimming pool now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet the kids are going to slip and fall in that water any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a waste, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just reach in and turn off the faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
